dcterms:description: The ConvAI2 dialogue corpus is utilized for training personalized dialogue generation models, providing textual persona descriptions that consist of multiple persona statements.

dcterms:description: The PersonaChat corpus is referenced as a foundational dataset for personalized dialogue agents, providing persona descriptions and dialogue examples.
